titleStmt.title: The woefull and lamentable wast and spoile done by a suddaine fire in S. Edmonds-bury in Suffolke, on Munday the tenth of Aprill. 1608

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed [by E. Allde] for Henrie Gosson, and are to be solde in Pater-noster rowe, at the signe of the Sunne,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
